name: Game under the night sky
description:
You just need to get out of the old house. Easy, is not it?

Can you get out of the house without falling into the hands of an insane scientist who likes to experiment on his victims?
Find out what happened to this house a few years ago. Solve the mystery of the house and escape from death!

Controls:
W,A,S,D - Move
E - Open the doors
F - Collect details/Make a Tool
Shift - Run
Good Luck...
